title: Arrival
text:
The iron grate slams shut above you, cutting off the last light from the world above. Your eyes adjust slowly to the dim glow of phosphorescent fungi clinging to cavern walls.

Welcome to The Understage.

A figure in grease-stained overalls approaches, holding a lantern. "Fresh from Above, eh? Don't get many of your kind down here anymore. Name's Rusty."

choices.label: Demand to be returned to the surface
Attack Rusty and take his lantern
